passives.name: Effervescence
passives.effects: Gain {{as|{{fd|1.2}}% '''bonus''' attack speed}} per 1% {{stil|heal and shield power}}.

passives.name: Peppermint
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] cause the {{tt|most wounded|Lowest health percent}} and nearest allied champion to be {{tip|heal|healed}} for {{pp|15 to 45}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 7% AP)}}.
